turns.content:
I'll give you all the text per article. For each article, I'll write  next to the last sentence, which means I've given you the entire article. You only need to say "spq" as I give you each article. After I give you the last article, I will say "Please provide your analysis" and you must follow the steps and template below to write your analysis within 300 characters. please.

steps : [1] For each text, rate it as positive, negative, or neutral. No explanation, just the result [2]Organize what the Cafe24 should do in the future in one line. 
template : ■Summary | ■The positive, negative and neutral tone | ■What Cafe24 should do
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
Sure, I'm ready. Please proceed.

I'm going to grow it from a shopping mall to a brand, but would it be overkill to move from Cafe24 to I'm Web..? Cafe24 It's hard to leave it to the designer all the time ㅠㅠㅠ
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

I'm trying to switch to a brand, but I don't like using Six Shop. I use Cafe24, but I always ask for something... it's difficult 
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

Problems when moving Cafe24 from I'mweb.. I made a request to extract data such as member information, products, and bulletin boards (reviews/notices, etc.) required when moving from I'mweb to Cafe24, but there were too many parts that couldn't be done. In particular, they said that the photo review itself was difficult. There are quite a few things I need to give up on the online shopping mall to move to Cafe24. Is it right to move to Cafe24?
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

Shopping mall business in Korea with a work visa As a side job, I am trying to sell small accessories in Japan by creating a Japanese shopping mall as a site supported in Korea. Will this cause problems with my work visa living in Japan? I used a site called Cafe24, and my identity was with a Korean resident registration card, and I submitted all of my address and Korean address account with Korean account authentication.
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

I'm trying to spread the product. There is a limit to sales only by yourself... I'm trying to verify the market before buying. What would be a good tool to spread to the entire market? There are Play Auto, Sabang Net, Next Engine, and Cafe 24. May I ask the owner who actually uses it in the comments? I want to write an effective tool
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

[Zigzag] I want to enter Zigzag, but this is a product registration question! See if you need to write an integrated solution Currently, Avley, Coupang, and Naver Smart Store are on sale, and there is no company mall. Is it possible for ZigZag to copy and paste the details of the page registered on Avley as it is? Cafe 24 now? one cell? I'm thinking about it, but I don't know which way is better.
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

Avery Product Upload Inquiry I've applied for Avley's store, but I don't know how to upload the products. The customer center can't even make inquiries over the phone. I'm running Cafe24, but the products aren't automatically uploaded. ? → Avley cannot be linked to Cafe24
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

My uncle wants to start a shopping mall business, but I don't know where to start helping him.. My uncle wants to sell photocopy paper and asks me to help him start a business, but everyone asks me to help him. I also need to create a shopping mall.. I first learned what Cafe 24 was by looking at it at a cafe right now... ㅜㅜ
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

How many hundreds of thousands of dollars does Cafe24 pg have to pay every year? Do you pay once in the beginning? 
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기
spq

Please provide your analysis
 
 
 
 지금 번역하기

■Summary: Customers have various concerns about using Cafe24 for their online shopping mall businesses, ranging from difficulty in migration to the platform, limitations in features, and integration with other services. Some customers are also considering other platforms, such as I'm Web and Zigzag.

■Tone: Negative

■What Cafe24 should do: Cafe24 should address the concerns and limitations that customers have with the platform, such as making migration easier and providing more features and integrations. They should also work on improving their customer service and providing better support to their users.
